body: I bought ZIM because Americans are consumers who make nothing but have lots of money (a generalization I know
created_at: and not intended as social commentary
column3: just a fact). Western Europe is similar
column4: but not to the degree of America. Asians make stuff and want to get money for it. They have to get stuff to America. Shipping is the only way to do it. Doesn't particularly matter that fuel prices are high
column6: Americans want stuff and dollars are going to flow to people who make stuff as long as Americans have dollars.
